etymology.description: 需(需) (xū, "require") + 要(要) (yào, "want; demand") = to need
etymology.interpretation: This combination makes sense because 需(需) (xū, "require") indicates a necessity, while 要(要) (yào, "want; demand") adds the element of desire or demand, resulting in the concept of needing something essential or desired.

examples.chinese: 我们需要友谊(我們需要友誼)，成长需要挑战(成長需要挑戰)。
examples.english: We need friendship, and growth requires challenges.
